title: In the year 20XX, Riot creates the Lee/Jarvan/Vi bar for junglers. What do the weak junglers get?
body:
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/bb/bb7fa40ad33721686c20936ac0300616c88e871a4540b1bcf9bd13f28c3c465f.jpg

For those of you who don't know, Riot decided in 2014 that they were going to stop the endless top lane nerf cycle by balancing every top laner around Renekton. That is, top laners who were stronger/more oppressive than Renekton in lane would get nerfs, while top laners who were weaker than Renekton and needed help would (in theory, though not really all that often in practice) get buffs. This decision became known as the infamous "Renekton bar". 

Now, in the year ~~2015~~ 20XX, Riot has decided that the jungle will be balanced around Lee Sin, Jarvan, and Vi. Any dedicated jungler who is weaker than the three will be buffed, while any jungler who is stronger (heh) than the three will be nerfed. 

What changes does Riot make to the other dedicated junglers to put them on par with the new balance?

"What do the weak junglers get?"

nerfs

Those three really do need nerfs because their kits are just poorly designed. They have everything the jungle role needs. They're what Morello would call the Ireila of the Jungle. CC that ignores tenacity, high mobility, damage and utility packed into a kit. They stomp on counterplay and with kits like these, they shove out every specialist. It's literally boiling down to "Who does everything best right now?"

I play Vi a lot in jungle, but I don't think she has everything.  She is a great generalist, but when I play Sejuani, I appreciate the amount of CC she brings to the table - especially her ult, which allows me to deliver CC without putting myself in danger.  If I'm low on hp, but my teammates are in trouble, I can throw my ult into a fight and get my team out or decide things in our favor.  As Vi, if I want to deliver CC or damage, I have to get in there myself (or use Chilling Smite, which might not be up and which has limited utility in a large teamfight).

Vi isn't mean to play team fights. Everthing on her kit is single targeted. She is meant to work as a tankier but slower assassin. She has no value on a teamfigh other than chase down (and perhaps kill) the enemy adc or apc.
Now Sejuani isn't meant to play anything but teamfights. She deals little damage to single targets and has no dueling capabilities. She is meant to work as a team while providing tons of cc and zoning while delivering small damage to large groups.
If VI deals 5 damage to a single target (maybe 1 extra for her E that may hit another enemies. Sejuani deals 1 Damage to 5 dfferent targets.

Basically, you are comparing apples and oranges since you will use and fit teams completely different. I believe the OP is comparing them to junglers that more or less serve the same funcion. Champions from the type of {{champion:131}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:5}} . Compared to those champions VI kit favors her enormously.  

Giving that meta favors tankier but slower assassin than true tanks it feels like Vi, Lee Sin, and J4 has everything they need to jungle.

I've found Vi to be quite useful in teamfights.  Vault Breaker and Assault and Battery are both great initiators, and can knock enemy teammembers out of formation and help my team clean them up, especially if I ult a squishy and lock them down.  Excessive Force does reasonable AoE damage, though it is a little hard to aim.  I build {{item:3071}} as well, which synchronizes well with denting blows and lets me shred an enemies' armor for my team to capitalize on.

At least to me, Vi seems to play similarly to {{champion:54}} in teamfights, by launching themselves into the enemy team and throwing them into disarray, allowing your team to roll in and crush them.

Try doing the same with an underfarm/underleveled vi. You would die before your ult could hit your target. 
Sejuani can still do the same role even if she is behind from the rest of her team. You ult to initiate, stun them and the proceed to zone.

The utility of Vi on teamfights is proportional to the damage you can do. Don't get me wrong I main Vi, I have nothings against her. But malphite is more like sejuani on team fights.
